job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Summary

As a Data Scientist at Fast, you will partner closely with product managers, engineering, design, marketing, sales, or other operational leaders to define core metrics/KPIs, generate actionable data insights from large datasets, build automated dashboards using data pipelines, and run experiments to measure impact of new initiatives.

 

Role

  • Run complex data queries, analyze large datasets and run statistical analyses to continuously drive deeper understanding of our customers and product performance
  • Create dashboards and reports with effective data visualizations
  • Be a thought partner to business leaders in determining quantitative success and process improvement
  • Build data pipelines and create scripts to automate processes and reports
  • Build models to improve our understanding of user behavior and predict future performance 


Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience in quantitative analysis roles
  • Fluent in SQL and a scripting language (R, Python)
  • Knowledge of experimentation and statistical methods
  • BS in quantitative field or equivalent experience
  • Skilled with Looker, Jupyter Notebook and other data visualization tools


Nice to Have

  • 5+ years of experience in quantitative analysis roles
  • Advanced degree in quantitative field or equivalent experience
  • Knowledge of building data pipelines (e.g. dbt, airflow)
  • Experience in e-commerce industry
  • Previous mature startup experience
